alert.note: Alert for Southern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 3:39PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Yolo and north central Sacramento Counties through 415 PM PDT... At 338 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Parkway-South Sacramento, or near Sacramento, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Dime size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sacramento, Elk Grove, Carmichael, West Sacramento, Florin, Freeport, Parkway-South Sacramento, La Riviera, Laguna, Rosemont, Raley Field, Sacramento Zoo, Arden-Arcade and Cal Expo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
